textPashto: .په يوه لاس چک نه کيږي
translation: One hand alone cannot make a sound.
meaning: Teamwork or cooperation is necessary to achieve results.

textPashto: .بد ګاونډی کور ورانوي
translation: A bad neighbor destroys the home.
meaning: The people around you can greatly impact your peace and safety.

textPashto: .دا زموږ له لاسه دی، نه د بخت کار
translation: It’s from us that it is upon us.
meaning: Our own actions often bring us trouble.

textDari: .هرچه بگندد نمکش می‌زنند، وای به روزی که بگندد نمک
textPashto: .هر څه چې خوسا شي، مالګه پکې اچوي، وای د هغه ورځ چې مالګه خوسا شي
translation: They salt what rots, but what if the salt itself rots?
meaning: If the one meant to fix the problem becomes corrupt, who will help then?

textPashto: .بیړه د شيطان کار دی
translation: Haste is from the devil.
meaning: Rushing into things often leads to mistakes; be patient and deliberate.

textDari: .دو صد گفته چون نیم کردار نیست
textPashto: .سل خبرې د يو عمل ارزښت نه لري
translation: Two hundred words are not worth half an action.
meaning: Actions speak louder than words.

textDari: .گر صبر کنی ز غوره حلوا سازی
textPashto: .که صبر وکړې له تروه مېوې خوږه حلوه جوړیږي
translation: If you are patient, sour grapes will become sweet halwa.
meaning: With patience, even the bitter can become sweet.

textPashto: .حرص والا تباه شو
translation: He who is greedy will be destroyed.
meaning: Greed leads to downfall.

textDari: .یک چوب می‌شکند، اما یک دسته نمی‌شکند
textPashto: .يو لرګی ماتيږي، خو څو لرګي يو ځای نه ماتيږي
translation: One stick breaks easily, but a bundle does not.
meaning: Unity and teamwork make you stronger.

textDari: .اگر همه با هم باشند، کوه را می‌توان جابجا کرد
textPashto: .که ټول سره يو شي، نو غر هم خوځولای شي
translation: If all are united, even a mountain can be moved.
meaning: Cooperation can overcome even the biggest challenges.

textDari: .یک دست به تنهایی کاری نمی‌تواند کرد
textPashto: .يو لاس یواځې څه نشي کولی
translation: One hand alone can't do much.
meaning: You need others to achieve meaningful goals.

textDari: .دو فکر بهتر از یک فکر است
textPashto: .دو فکر تر يو فکر غوره دی
translation: Two minds are better than one.
meaning: Collaboration brings bet solutions.

textPashto: .همکاري ځواک راولي
translation: Cooperation brings strength.
meaning: Working together empowers everyone involved.

textDari: .صبر تلخ است، اما میوه‌اش شیرین است
textPashto: .صبر تریو دی، خو مېوه یې خوږه ده
translation: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
meaning: Though waiting is hard, the outcome is rewarding.

textPashto: .په صبر سره ډبره نرمه کيږي
translation: With patience, even stone becomes soft.
meaning: Patience can overcome even the hardest obstacles.

textDari: .آن که صبر دارد، کلید هر در دارد
textPashto: .چا چې صبر وکړ، د هر دروازه کیلي به لاس ته راوړي
translation: He who has patience holds the key to every door.
meaning: Patience opens the way to many opportunities.

textPashto: .صبر د درد دوا ده
translation: Patience is the cure for pain.
meaning: Time and patience help heal emotional wounds.

textDari: .عجله کار شیطان است، صبر کار انسان
textPashto: .بیړه د شیطان کار دی، صبر د انسان
translation: Haste is the work of the devil, patience is the work of man.
meaning: Wise people are patient; impulsive behavior leads to regret.

textPashto: .په سختیو کې صبر د ځواک نښه ده
translation: Patience in hardship is a sign of strength.
meaning: True strength is shown through enduring tough times calmly.

textDari: .صبر کن، که طلوع بعد از تاریکی است
textPashto: .صبر وکړه، ځکه روڼا د تیارې نه وروسته راځي
translation: Be patient, for dawn comes after darkness.
meaning: Tough times will pass; stay patient and hopeful.

textPashto: .څوک چې د بل لپاره کوهي کيندي، خپل ځان پکې غورځوي
translation: The well-digger has fallen into the well.
meaning: If you plan harm for others, you may become a victim of your own plot.

textPashto: .بد ګاونډی کور ورانوي
translation: A bad neighbor destroys the home.
meaning: The people around you can greatly impact your peace and safety.

textPashto: .بد ګاونډی کور ورانوي
translation: A bad neighbor destroys the home.
meaning: The people around you can greatly impact your peace and safety.

textPashto: .په يوه لاس چک نه کيږي
translation: One hand alone cannot make a sound.
meaning: Teamwork or cooperation is necessary to achieve results.
